ModMetaData.name: Divine Embrace
ModMetaData.author: ﴾HMCS Québec﴿
ModMetaData.description:
[h1]Divine Embrace[/h1] Divine Embrace is an overpowered mod that adds a multi-purpose material, bionics that cover every body parts and organs, a building to unlock researches and a veratile tool cabinet. Everything is unlocked after finding the research building and researching the appropriate research projects.
[h2] Full list of featured things:[/h2] [list] [h3][*]Research projects:[/h3] - Divine Revelation: Can only be worked on with the Sanctified Scripture linked to an Advanced Research Bench. \n - Apotheosis: Same condition as Divine Revelation. Unlocks the bionics. [h3][*]Material:[/h3] - Holy essence. Counts as Stone, Wood, Metal and Cloth. Can be mined from the Medieval Overhaul Mine Shaft after unlocking Divine Revelation. [h3][*]Divine bionics:[/h3] - A full suite of bionics, with some having special properties. [h3][*]Sanctified scripture:[/h3] - A research building only found in quests that unlocks the Divine Revelation research. [h3][*]Holy tools cabinet:[/h3] - A verstatile tool cabinet that provides a substantial work speed buff. [/list]
